/Defs/ThingDef[defName="VWE_Gun_UraniumSlugRifle" or defName="VWE_Gun_SwarmMissileLauncher" or defName="VWE_Gun_HeavyFlamer" or defName="VWE_Gun_HandheldMortar" or defName="VWE_Gun_Autocannon"]

ThingDef.label: tox grenade belt
ThingDef.description: Charge powered lethal gas canister causing toxic buildup over a very short period of time, strapped to a belt. Can be reloaded using tox grenades.

ThingDef.label: dynamite belt
ThingDef.description: Makeshift explosive sticks of chemfuel strapped to a belt. They can be thrown a short distance, where they will explode after a random amount of time. Can be reloaded using dynamite.

ThingDef.label: tear gas grenade belt
ThingDef.description: Modern canister containing a special compound commonly referred to as tear gas, strapped to a belt. Can be reloaded using tear gas grenades.

ThingDef.label: smoke grenade belt
ThingDef.description: Old school condensed smoke canisters that explodes into a smoke wall on impact, strapped to a belt. Can be reloaded using smoke grenades.

ThingDef.label: flash grenade belt
ThingDef.description: A belt of flash grenades. Temporarily stuns organic enemies allowing users to close the distance. Can be reloaded using flash grenades.

ThingDef.label: Warcasket UAG-40
ThingDef.description: The UAG-40 is an ukrainian automatic grenade launcher. It is manufactured by the armament company Leninska Kuznya.

ThingDef.label: Warcasket UAG-40
ThingDef.description: The UAG-40 is an ukrainian automatic grenade launcher. It is manufactured by the armament company Leninska Kuznya.
